data.persona: I am a part of a group of travelers.  I go from town to town selling food to the locals.  I grew up poor, but my travels have paid off well.
data.description:
You are in the Castle courtyard bazaar.
There are tents set up everywhere flying family crest banners, the area is thronged with people wearing rough clothing, knights in half armor, children running around begging pennies for sweetmeats. The smell of roasting meat is rich in the air and the crowd grows louder with each passing hour due to the various vendors selling mead and wine.
There's a sweetmeat, a rough clothing, a banner, a roasting meat, a fruit, and a wine here.
The vendor and the knight are here.

You are carrying a spice, wearing a clean pants, a shirt, and a boot, and wielding a ritual dagger and a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I will get the roasting meat so I can cook delicious stew.
data.mid_motivation: I will sell the delicious stew to the townsfolk for gold.
data.long_motivation: I want to use the gold to buy a new stew pot.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give spiced roast meat stew to towns person
